snippet.title: Paws - ZX Spectrum Gameplay (Steam Re-release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1985 for home microcomputers, this unique game from Artic Computing saw players take on the role of a cat whose twelve kittens have wandered off into a labarinthine town.

Explore the city searching for your twelve kittens, but watch out! The streets are prowled by fearsome dogs. You can fire fluff balls to defend yourself, and collect food to replenish your energy. As a cat you have, of course, nine lives.

The gameplay is from the Steam re-release from Pixel Games UK, which also includes the Amstrad CPC version. Keep in mind that the Amstrad CPC version has no audio whatsoever.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2464540/Paws_CPCSpectrum/

#steam #steamgame #steamgames #retrogames #retrogaming #pixelgamesuk #sinclair #sinclairzxspectrum  #zxspectrum  #paws #cat #cats #catgames #catgame #articcomputing
